keyMappings:
# To start clean
unmapAll

# Scrolling
map h scrollLeft
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map l scrollRight

map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map d scrollPageDown
map u scrollPageUp

# Tabs
map <c-h> moveTabLeft
map <c-l> moveTabRight
map <c-p> togglePinTab
map W moveTabToNewWindow

# Links
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map yf LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

# History
map H goBack
map L goForward

# Find mode
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map v enterVisualMode
